data.title: ICSA 2024 China Conference (June 28 – 30, 2024) – International Chinese Statistical Association
data.text:
The 2024 ICSA China Conference, which will be held at Wuhan, Hubei, China from June 28 – 30, 2024, is around the corner. The conference is co-sponsored by Zhongnan University of Economics and Law (ZUEL). The conference venue will be at Wuhan East Lake Hotel, located on the shore of the beautiful East Lake in Wuchang, the urban center of Wuhan. The hotel information can be found at http://www.el-h.com/. For more information, please contact the Scientific Program Committee Chair, Professor Xinping Cui at xpcui@ucr.edu. If you have any questions, please contact the conference organizers directly. For detailed information, you may refer to this site: 2024 ICSA China Conference. Registration and hotel reservations have open to public via Register – 2024 ICSA China Conference. For more details, please visit https://icsa.zuel.edu.cn/.

ICSA 2024 China Conference (June 28 – 30, 2024)
